Name: Swedish Diachronic Corpus
Description:
This is a diachronic corpus covering the period between the 13th and 21st centuries.
The texts are from various genres and include amongst others letters, charters, laws, lyrics, regulations, pamphlets, and so on.
Some of the smaller subcorpora are manually annotated while the larger subcorpora are either unannotated or semi-automatically annotated.
The corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpaged affiliated with SWE-CLARIN.
